doc: Alpha 5 is seeing a major navbar update, but it's still not ready for prime time. I'm struggling to figure out a solid way to build this right now that works for all the components, responsive behaviors, and the default/flex variations.
With some of the other Alpha 6 changes I have planned, I'm hoping to get these remaining navbar issues in our next release:
- [ ] #18053: Container adding extra padding for mobile sizes
